data.text: @MarshallGwede @Beatonm5 @shoeslambada @WenyuDutch @litfestharare True. Many have it in place of black tea. My initial intro to zumbani was in 2016,  thanks to my sister but we didn't have a good start then, I couldn't stand the scent! Now we occasionally hangout when I have a cuppa 😂
@Beatonm5 @shoeslambada @WenyuDutch @litfestharare @DrNyarai Zumbani, resurrection tea, we all for it. But for  me, Moringa was precovid

@Beatonm5 @shoeslambada @WenyuDutch @litfestharare @DrNyarai Think about it, I used to have it with my granny long back in the early 2000s in Chivhu...she always talked about it's innate healing powers hahaha
